summary:
*This mod contains gore and mutilation*
This is a standalone follower mod. No need of other mods or DLCs.
You can find him at the cemetery in Falkreath.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]!!This mod contains gore and mutilation!![/color]

This is a standalone follower mod. No need of other mods or DLCs.
You can find him at the cemetery in Falkreath.

Primary Skills:Heavy Armor, Light Armor, Block
Perks:Shield Wall, Juggernaut, Agile Defender

Essential(He's already died once), marriable.
He has a regeneration ability, resist poison and weakness to fire.

There is nothing but ragged trousers in his inventory.
Be careful if you need to get him naked. He has a severe wound on genitals.

-----------------------
Credits
Face and body:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/]Better males[/url]
Hair:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
Teeth:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/]Smile in HD[/url]
Eyes:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url]

author: Cryptoporus
